name: Rocket League Sideswipe: Tips and tricks for beginners
description: Rocket League has seen exponential growth since it went free-to-play in 2020, even though the game has been around for more than five years. This means the game has a rather wide collection when it comes to cosmetics that players can use to decorate their vehicles.

name: Don’t be a toxic player
description: I mean, we understand that flexing on your opponents can be part of a player’s personality, but it is still just a game and everything should be left on the field, even the rivalry.

name: Five tips and tricks for Rocket League Sideswipe
description: This is especially true while your cruising through the lower tiers of the game, from Bronze to the early part of Gold, most players rely on power more than finesse so don’t be scared to use your shadow defence skills, lay back and wait for the opportunity to get a good open shot at the net.

name: Jump
description: This is introduced at the start of the game and is pretty self explanatory but just to be as comprehensive as possible, pressing the jump button launches you into the air while maintaining your momentum. You're using this a lot, I hope.

name: Network
description: Set the network input buffer ideally to moderate. In case you face any in-game glitch, increase it further. However setting the Network Input Buffer high may sometimes result in your in-game touch controls getting sluggish and non-responsive. In that case you have to lower the Network Input Buffer. We suggest you to ideally set it to Moderate.

name: Audio
description: Switch to the audio settings page by tapping on the Audio tab below. Up next, you have to set the gameplay volume and music volume as per your preference. We would recommend you to keep them at default 100% for the best experience. Also, keep the music always on, because the game has a really cool playlist to hear. Keep the auto-update listening mode turned on. We would suggest you use earphones for the best experience.

name: Graphics
description: Finally, we head to the Graphics settings for which we need to go to the Graphics Tab. Set the Quality Presets to High to enjoy enhanced visuals. Set the Max FPS to default 30. Do not tamper with the frame rate. Also, do not forget to keep the Reduce FPS in the menu box checked to save the device battery.

name: Red shot (the power shot)
description: To do it: front flip into the ball (arrow + jump*2) >> hit the ball with the nose of your car >> ball will glow the blue+pink color

name: Purple shot (the defensive shot)
description: To do it: face the underside of your car towards the ball >> let go of your left joystick >> jump (as soon as you let go of your left joystick)

name: Gold shot (the backward shot)
description: To do it: aim your car away from the ball >> flip (arrow + jump*2) in that direction (basically the opposite of the purple shot)

name: League Sideswipe Ranks
description: There are a number of Rocket League Sideswipe ranks, ranging from lowly Bronze to the not-at-all OTT Grand Champion, and you can earn these by playing matches and winning. By the same token, losing matches will cause you to get demoted in both division and rank.

name: League Sideswipe Air Roll
description: As you'd expect from a simplified mobile version of the original, performing a Rocket League Sideswipe air roll is easier than ever. Its scaled-down arenas, higher goals, and automatically regenerating boost make the Rocket League Sideswipe air roll trick is an essential skill. And we're going to teach you how to master it.

name: perform the death-defying Rocket League Sideswipe
description: In Rocket League Sideswipe, your booster fuel automatically regenerates while you're on the ground, making it a lot easier to battle with other players in the air. At the same time, this is a side-scrolling game, meaning that you have one less dimension to take into account than with the original version. All of this serves to make aerial maneuvering significantly easier.

name: Rocket League Season 4 Rocket Pass Rewards
description: Season 4 of Psyonix’s explosive vehicular soccer game Rocket League has officially arrived. Today marks the release of their tenth battle pass or the fourth since the game went free-to-play last year. There are 70 tiers to work through this time around and two tracks to pick from, including Free and Premium. Let’s take a look at the Rocket League Season 4 Rocket Pass Rewards.

name: How to Do Freeplay in Rocket League Sideswipe
description: To do Freeplay in Rocket League Sideswipe, go to the main menu, select Training Mode, and go to Freeplay.

name: Rocket League Season 4 Rocket Pass Premium Rewards
description: As for the rewards, the ultimate Tier 70 reward for the Rocket League Season 4 Rocket Pass Premium track is the Outlaw GXT. We also have plenty of wild west-themed items along the way, including wheels, decals, trails, and more. You can find a full list of the Rocket League Season 4 Rocket Pass rewards broken down by Premium and Free down below.

name: Rocket League Sideswipe Redeem Codes
description: With its popularity reaching a new high each day, the game would surely reward us with more redeem codes in the future. We hope that they bring some special codes soon so that we can enjoy these insane effects even while playing a match.

name: customize vehicles in Rocket League Sideswipe
description: Like the console version, Rocket League Sideswipe delivers a collection of cosmetics to apply to your cars. These items can be purchased through the Shop tab or obtained via the Rocket Pass. Although there are many ways to unlock them, a few steps need to be made before they can be added to your vehicle.

name: BOOST BUTTON IN ROCKET LEAGUE SIDESWIPE
description: https://www.okaygotcha.com/ezoimgfmt/blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/a/AVvXsEgse5EjXPK7eRe4DiEI82WO4tq7CNrd9JxqEsadi0i6wpKIQ9xWBOynO4Fo9hCyE5QwuDvS8u8rWsqYLz0ryt1k_iXk5UPd_2FOBowXRCrGsgngBUEh66OfPPT6ZHTDOXT3rOtqo6dQXV-1KtR0yiPEnbZtoQgioVxKwAV83BJ9Z0vg7lrCuejqkkB8gA=s16000?ezimgfmt=rs:748x420/rscb1/ng:webp/ngcb1
img: Epic Games has thought of you and allows you to add a third button. To do this, you need to go to options, then game settings, then command customization . Once there you will see a third button appear, click on it and activate it.

name: Best Settings
description: https://cdn.brgeeks.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/12/Screenshot_20211202-173232_RL-Sideswipe-2048x970.jpg
img: While the game is easy to pick up, it is hard to master. Paying attention to the game’s settings can help you increase your skill beyond your opponents. Doing so will also result in winning more games and having a good rank. With that said, let’s get started and find out the best Rocket League Sideswipe settings.

name: Increase Aerial Speed In Rocket League Sideswipe
description: Just go into free play, then click settings, then show options and tick the box that reads unlimited boost in free play and that’s it.

name: Spinning
description: The only way to actually spin inside swipe is to double-tap the joystick, this will rotate you until you let go which will put your car back to normal.

name: Faceoff
description: When going for any 50-50 or Face-Off make sure to use the fast aerial button so you can get there faster than your opponent.

name: Power of Joystick
description: There is no limit how fast you can move your car in a circle, the joystick can be moved as fast as your finger can go.

name: Rocket League Sideswipe Season 1 Rocket Pass rewards
description: There are 50 different rewards to unlock in the Rocket League Sideswipe Season 1 Battle Pass. Things start off very nicely at level one, where you unlock the Diestro Exotic Car Body.

name: PLAY ROCKET LEAGUE SIDESWIPE WITH CONTROLLER
description: You can play Rocket League Sideswipe with any controller that is compatible with your device. The first thing that you need to do is connect your mobile to the controller via Bluetooth. Then, open Rocket League Sideswipe and you must be able to use your controller to navigate into the game.

name: secret moves in Rocket
description: There are a few secret moves in Rocket League Sideswipe. The two most interesting ones are named after colors, because they change the color of the ball when performed successfully in the arena.

name: Enrollment Process
description: If you want to play this game,  then you will need to enroll for the same, and here is how you can do it.  You have to open Google Play Store and type Rocket League Sideswipe Alpha Test,  on the search bar. You have to open the test app,  where you would be able to find an option to request access.

name: Rocket League Sideswipe controller not working fix
description: ocket League Sideswipe features much of the same environment in a 2D format. Though you can still pull some of the same maneuvers you can do on the regular version of the game, Rocket League Sideswipe plays differently and players will need to get used to the controls if they’re looking to climb up the game’s ranked ladder.

name: How to get Titanium White Octane in Rocket League Sideswipe
description: Sideswipe has released its iteration of the Rocket Pass, and whilst some beloved items have made their way to the pocket version of car soccer, plenty of ol’ reliables are still missing from the mobile game.

name: Rocket League Sideswipe Android Requirements
description: Rocket League Sideswipe also throws the same error whenever players with low-end smartphones try to download the game. To avoid such issues, first, make sure you meet the device requirements.

name: CHOOSE THE PERFECT JOYSTICK.
description: Just like we suggested for the buttons, set the weight of the joystick to 50%. A larger joystick would occupy space for impossible work. The Joystick Anchor determines how much a joystick moves from the center. Take it up when you’re up to 15 degrees.

name: The game modes
description: as its name suggests, the duel is played 1 against 1. In Rocket League Sidesweep 2D arena, your objective is to score a goal in the opposing camp on the left of the screen, while protecting yours, on the right of the screen.

name: Challenges
description: The challenges are divided into 2 categories: weekly challenges and season challenges. As the names suggest, these challenges are only available for one limited time. You can find examples of tasks to perform to validate these challenges

name: Rocket League Sideswipe Kickoff
description: The second-best kickoff in Rocket League Sideswipe will make your opponents mad. This is the fake kickoff, it is as simple as it sounds. Drive toward the ball and then turn around before you get too close, so your opponents hit the ball directly back into you

name: A wide variety of rewards
description: There aren’t many different challenges, but that doesn’t mean they are easy. Five in number, each of them will give you access to rewards in Fortnite and Rocket Sideswipe, and they can be completed in any order. You will find below, the list of the five challenges and the rewards to recover.

name: Best Rocket League Sideswipe Kickoff
description: The second-best kickoff in Rocket League Sideswipe will make your opponents mad. This is the fake kickoff, it is as simple as it sounds. Drive toward the ball and then turn around before you get too close, so your opponents hit the ball directly back into you.

name: Get More XP On Mobile
description: On Rocket League and Sideswipe mobile, you can earn bonus XP and it works interchangeably and it's awesome. All you have to do is make sure when you log into Rocket League sideswipe, you're logged into the same epic games account that you play Rocket League on. Then basically just to get people to play both games, what they're doing is if you level up on Rocket League, you then get a bonus win in sideswipe. It is necessary to move up the tiers in Rocket Pass and get into higher leagues.

name: air roll in Rocket
description: Performing a Rocket League Sideswipe air roll is surprisingly easy. What beginners might have trouble with is maintaining control of their car after landing the move.

name: Monetization
description: Since it's still early days with Sideswipe only in alpha, it does not appear that the monetization system is active yet. You can see the bones for a pass system, as well as support for mystery items you pay in-game currency to unlock.

name: A Bonus Rocket League Sideswipe
description: Here we got one more bonus kickoff. This is mostly meant to style under opponents. This is a 2v2 kickoff where one teammate drives up the right wall and goes for an aerial while the other pinches it upward towards that teammate. If you're looking to flex on people this is the kickoff we recommend

name: The Power Shot
description: The Red Shot is the most commonly used shot in Rocket League Sideswipe. It can be used in situations where you want to hit the ball with a lot of power and also stay in close contact with the ball at the same time so as not to lose possession, just in case you need to follow up with more touches.

name: Delayed-Flip Shot
description: It is just an ordinary flip shot played at the last minute. There is no expiration time on your flip and hence you can delay your jump a bit and fool your opponent. It can be used during air-dribbling when your opponent comes between you and the goal.

name: No-Flip Shot
description: This is basically what we refer to as a fake shot in a soccer game. Just stay close to the ball by boosting up towards it. Slightly nudge the joystick upwards when hitting the ball so as to draw your opponent into thinking that you are going to flip the ball past him. This will put a similar feeling as flipping.

name: Shop
description: As you would expect, the in-game currency can be used to purchase cosmetics for your vehicle, and there is a Rocket Pass where you'll earn extra rewards by playing, also free. Clearly, these are the bones of what's to come, so I would imagine a cash shop will arrive in the future. Still, as of right now, the game contains zero monetization, making this the best time to jump in.

name: Different Color Shots
description: Colored shots are a sign of a perfect power shot. There are Red, Purple, and Golden shots. However, out of these three – Red and Purple shots are most effective since Red shot allows you to make an extremely powerful shot whereas Purple shots allow you to move back after a shot. Make the Red shot by moving close to the ball and then a Jump-Boost followed by a flip. Make the Purple shot by half flipping backward and then hit the Jump button.

name: How to get purple shot
description: To get a purple shot in Rocket League Sideswipe, you will need to use your flip with all of your four wheels facing the ball and dodging into it.

name: customize my vehicle
description: Yes! In Sideswipe, you have a host of different customizations to help personalize your car. You have almost as many customization categories as in the original game; the only missing one is the antenna category.

name: Do I need a powerful phone to run it
description: Not really. The latest and greatest flagship phones can run this game with no sweat, but even less powerful phones will be able to run it without an issue. There are graphic settings that you can adjust to fit your phone’s needs.

name: Are there a lot of in-app purchases
description: There are not a lot of in-app purchases; in fact, there are NONE. The only currency you use to purchase cars and customizations comes in the form of gold “SP” coins. You earn these coins by just playing the game.

name: storage does this game take up
description: Most of your progress is saved in the cloud which is why it doesn’t inflate that much. If you plan on getting this game, you’ll want to make sure you have at least 1.5 GB- 2GB of free storage.

name: game modes are there
description: Right now, there are only a handful of different game modes you can play both online and offline. For offline playing, you have a training mode where you can practice your moves on an empty field. There’s also an Exhibition mode where you can design your own match against bots.

name: Making your car spin for freestyling
description: If you want to change other things about the car, you can change its tires, the trail it makes when you boost, and the explosion it makes when you make a goal.

name: Faking a flip shot
description: There are no restrictions on how you can or cannot use your joystick to maneuver your car therefore if you are not that expert at flipping, you can fake a flip. You can do this by boosting up to the ball and slightly nudging the joystick upwards when hitting the ball, this will put a similar effect on the ball as flipping.

name: Flip for powerful shots
description: f you started the game recently, you might believe that the best way to shoot a powerful shot is by spamming the boost button in front of the ball.

name: Jump reset on the ground
description: You can only jump twice once off the ground and jumps become crucial since they allow you to make powerful shots. But do you know that the jumps get reset when you are in contact with the ground

name: Complete Event Challenges to equip new items
description: Starting from December 13th, 2021, players will be able to unlock the rewards and equip them on the car by just launching the game. However, to access the special live event you need to make sure that you are logged in with your Epic games account.
